articles.content: When Google launched the Pixel 5 back in October, we were excited to get our hands on its new apps. (The phone itself is pretty cool, too.) With the Pixel 5’s launch came new versions of the Google C… [+5499 chars]

articles.author: Alan Friedman
articles.title: Xiaomi introduces a new concept phone with quad waterfall screens, no buttons, notches, or ports - PhoneArena
articles.description: Xiaomi has unveiled a new concept phone with a quad-sided 88-degree waterfall screen. More interesting, the device has no ports, nary a notch, and absolutely no buttons.

articles.author: Sal Romano
articles.title: Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time Remake delayed to unannounced date - Gematsu
articles.description: Publisher Ubisoft and developers Ubisoft Pune and Ubisoft Mumbai have delayed Prince of Persia: The Sands of Time Remake from its previously announced March release date to an unannounced date.
